text: K. Dane Wittrup is an American engineer currently the Carbon P. Dubbs Professor in Chemical Engineering and Biological Engineering at Massachusetts Institute of Technology. He was Elected to the National Academy of Engineering in 2012. His research has made advancements in protein engineering and biopharmaceutical engineering. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Massachusetts Institute of Technology faculty Category:21st-century American engineers Category:University of New Mexico alumni Category:California Institute of Technology alumni
title: K. Dane Wittrup
